dataList.name: Stigmatized
dataList.desc:
- Targeted by Der Fluchschütze
- Expires at จบเทิร์น

dataList.name: Infliction Refraction
dataList.desc: +1 to Burn, Bleed, Tremor, Rupture, and Sinking Potency inflicted against enemies with Skills & Coin effects

dataList.name: Gain Refraction
dataList.desc: +1 to Poise and Charge Count gained by allies with Skills & Coin effects

dataList.name: Refracted Mind
dataList.desc: 3 allies with the least SP heal 8 SP at จบเทิร์น (excluding: allies that are Panicked or Corroded)

dataList.name: 버프 이름
dataList.desc: On Crit, at more than 20 Poise Potency, ผลาญ up to 20 of the excess Poise Potency to deal +(Poise Potency consumed x 2.5)% damage on Critical Hit (สูงสุด 50%)

dataList.name: Refracted Charge
dataList.desc:
On Hit with Skills that consumed 8+ Charge Count: +0.1 to Envy Resistance บนตัวเป้าหมาย for this Encounter (once per Skill per enemy; สูงสุด Resistance adjustment: 0.3)
Skills that ได้รับ or ผลาญ Charge Count deal +(10 + (Count gained or consumed x 2))% damage (สูงสุด 50%)

dataList.name: Refracted Burst
dataList.desc: จบเทิร์น: against all enemy Parts, inflict Wrath damage เท่ากับ Burn Potency on each Part; then, reduce their Burn Count by 1, trigger Tremor Burst once, and reduce their Tremor Count by 1 (activates only at 2+ Count)

dataList.name: Refracted Rupture
dataList.desc: Rupture Skills that inflict Rupture Potency or Count: แต้มปิดท้ายสกิล +2

dataList.name: Refracted Sinking
dataList.desc: Deal +(Sinking Potency บนตัวเป้าหมาย)% damage against targets at less than 0 SP or without SP (สูงสุด 45%)

dataList.name: Weakness Destroyed
dataList.desc: Deal +30% damage against Destroyed or Staggered Parts

dataList.name: Nebulizer
dataList.desc: First เริ่มเทิร์น of a wave: all allies ได้รับ 5 Poise Potency and +5 Poise Count. If Pride Reson. was activated, all allies ได้รับ 3 Poise Potency and +3 Poise Count at Combat Start

dataList.name: The Lone Gunman
dataList.desc: Raise Min & สูงสุด Speed values for the #1 Deployed Identity by 1. The said unit loses a Skill 1, but gains a Skill 3

dataList.name: Lasting Battle Spirit
dataList.desc: Starting from #7 Deployed Sinner: at the start of the same turn it Substitutes in, heal 30 SP, ได้รับ 1 Attack Power Up for the Encounter, และได้รับ 2 ทรัพยากร E.G.O for each one of the Affinities corresponding to their Base Attack Skills

dataList.name: Resource Reaping
dataList.desc: After using an Attack or a Counter Skill, if the enemy is defeated, ได้รับ 2 ทรัพยากร E.G.O of the Skill Affinity that was used (once per Skill, including E.G.O Skills)

dataList.name: 버프 이름
dataList.desc: When backup enemies enter the battle, inflict 5 Bleed and +3 Bleed against them at Combat Start. If there is a <Bloodfiend> among allies: when above conditions are met: activate Bleed on all enemies once and reduce their Bleed Count by 1

dataList.name: Dogged Defense
dataList.desc: All allies take -50% damage

dataList.name: Life or Death
dataList.desc: All allies deal +30% damage

dataList.name: Wrathful Counter
dataList.desc: When hit, ได้รับ 2 Offense Level Up ในเทิร์นถัดไป (สูงสุด 6)

dataList.name: Pendant of Nostalgia
dataList.desc: Combat Start: 3 currently earliest Deployed allies ได้รับ 10 Poise Potency

dataList.name: 버프 이름
dataList.desc:
Skills that ผลาญ Ammo: แต้มแคลชสกิล +2, deal +(60 / # of Coins)% damage. At 0 Ammo, ได้รับ 2 Ammo at the ในเทิร์นถัดไป Start (once per Encounter per Identity)
Change the Gloom Resistance of the Final Boss of Section 3 to Weak(x1.5)

dataList.name: Fell Bullet Deluge
dataList.desc: Whenever an ally dies, inflict fixed damage เท่ากับ 50% of the dead ally's สูงสุด HP against all Parts on all enemies

dataList.name: HP Manipulation

dataList.name: Perilous Contest

dataList.name: Bloody Banquet
dataList.desc: On Hit, if the enemy lost HP, heal HP เท่ากับ 10% of the damage dealt. All allies lose 3 Bleed Count at จบเทิร์น

dataList.name: Festival of Blood
dataList.desc: Each ally deals +1% damage ตามทุก ๆ 10 Bloodfeast they Consumed (สูงสุด 30%)

dataList.name: Stigmatized
dataList.desc:
- Cannot be removed
- If at 0 at จบเทิร์น, become Staggered ในเทิร์นถัดไป
- When using 'Designated Target Fire' Skill, if the target isn't Stigmatized, lose 1 Stack
- If the 'Designated Target Fire' Skill loses the Clash, lose 1 Stack
- If the ally this unit targeted before using the 'Designated Target Fire' Skill is killed, lose 1 Stack
